title: I was playing a Rank Match But I got a Black out but my team won but i got my lp lost?
body:
I got a Black out, so i can't play the match, i want to play the match but i got the black out, so i waited for my light to come back up, And I went to my computer and look at the match history and My team won..........But i didn't got Lp....I know that if you not play you team will get mad but I got a black out From Nowhere, So riot......I want to say,.........If a person ever have a black out can they not lose their Lp. Thank you 



By: JOJOTrainer   Date:5/15/2017

replies.body: Since you were in the middle of a blackout you would not have been able to stay in the match to help your team. After a certain amount of time away from the match, the system would have flagged you as AFK since you were not there to help your team during the match. Even if your team pulls through and wins the match, it will be counted as a loss for you since you were not technically in the game. There's not much we can do here about blackouts in your area, since there's not a way for us to predict those kinds of things.
